titleInfo.title: 20th Anniversary of B'nai B'rith Colorado Lodge #2271

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''20th Anniversary of Colorado Lodge 2271, B'nai B'rith. L-R Sonney Gershman, Harvey Friedentag, Harvey Olin, Charter members, holding constitution, #395.'' Handwritten on front of photograph: ''Mar 1980, 20th Anniversary, B'nai B'rith, Colorado, Lodge, #2271, Left to Right, Sonny Gershman, Harvey Friedentag, Harvey Olin, original charter members.''

mods.abstract: Left to right Sonny Gershman, Harvey Friedentag, and Harvey Olin, original charter members of B'nai B'rith Colorado Lodge #2271, hold the charter of the lodge.
mods.note: Donated by B'nai B'rith Colorado Chapter #2271.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
